verses.verse: Now the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> was more <S%H6175>subtle<s%> than <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>made.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H637>Yes,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> has <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden?<s%>
And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> We may <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden:<s%>

But of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>said,<s%> You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of it, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you <S%H5060>touch<s%> it, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And the <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> You shall not surely <S%H4191>die:<s%>

For <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H3045>know<s%> that in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, then your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and you shall be as <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H3045>knowing<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

And when the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6086>tree<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food,<s%> and that it was <S%H8378>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and a <S%H6086>tree<s%> to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> to make one <S%H7919>wise,<s%> she <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, and did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to her <S%H376>husband<s%> with her; and he did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of them <S%H8147>both<s%> were <S%H6491>opened,<s%> and they <S%H3045>knew<s%> that they were <S%H5903>naked;<s%> and they <S%H8609>sewed<s%> <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H5929>leaves<s%> together, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1992>themselves<s%> <S%H2290>aprons.<s%>

And they <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> in the <S%H7307>cool<s%> of the <S%H3117>day:<s%> and <S%H120>Adam<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2244>hid<s%> themselves from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H120>Adam,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H335>Where<s%> are you?

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and I was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> I was <S%H5903>naked;<s%> and I <S%H2244>hid<s%> myself.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> you that you were <S%H5903>naked?<s%> Have you <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you that you should not <S%H398>eat?<s%>
And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H5414>gave<s%> to be with me, she <S%H5414>gave<s%> me of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and I did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done?<s%> And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H5175>serpent<s%> <S%H5377>beguiled<s%> me, and I did <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> you are <S%H779>cursed<s%> above <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and above <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> on your <S%H1512>belly<s%> shall you <S%H3212>go,<s%> and <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life:<s%>

And I will <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H342>enmity<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> and her <S%H2233>seed;<s%> it shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> your <S%H7218>head,<s%> and you shall <S%H7779>bruise<s%> his <S%H6119>heel.<s%>

To the <S%H802>woman<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will greatly <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H6093>sorrow<s%> and your <S%H2032>conception;<s%> in <S%H6089>sorrow<s%> you shall <S%H3205>bring<s%> <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H1121>children;<s%> and your <S%H8669>desire<s%> shall be to your <S%H376>husband,<s%> and he shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you.

And to <S%H121>Adam<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> you have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H802>wife,<s%> and have <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of it: <S%H779>cursed<s%> is the <S%H127>ground<s%> for your <S%H5668>sake;<s%> in <S%H6093>sorrow<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> of it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life;<s%>
<S%H6975>Thorns<s%> also and <S%H1863>thistles<s%> shall it <S%H6779>bring<s%> <S%H6779>forth<s%> to you; and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%>

In the <S%H2188>sweat<s%> of your <S%H639>face<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> you <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H127>ground;<s%> for out of it were you <S%H3947>taken:<s%> for <S%H6083>dust<s%> you are, and to <S%H6083>dust<s%> shall you <S%H7725>return.<s%>
And <S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H802>wife's<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H2332>Eve;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she was the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living.<s%>
To <S%H120>Adam<s%> also and to his <S%H802>wife<s%> did the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3801>coats<s%> of <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of us, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil:<s%> and <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H7971>put<s%> <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H2425>live<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%>

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> him forth from the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden,<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> from from <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was <S%H3947>taken.<s%>

So he <S%H1644>drove<s%> out the <S%H120>man;<s%> and he <S%H7931>placed<s%> at the <S%H6924>east<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> <S%H3742>Cherubim,<s%> and a <S%H3858>flaming<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> which <S%H2015>turned<s%> every way, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the way of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
